content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various shell commands, but encountered errors indicating that the necessary files could not be found. All AI suggested commands failed with the same error message. The latest attempts using "conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" and ". /opt/conda/bin/activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" failed with an error indicating that the necessary file could not be found. The latest development involved three more AI suggested commands to activate the environment, but all failed with the same error message. The latest attempt using "/opt/miniconda3/bin/conda activate arcgis && echo 'Environment activated.'" also failed with an error indicating that the necessary file could not be found.
"""
